document_data.caption: Karie, orating to the masses.
document_data.name: Karie Leddle
document_data.mainbody: rie was a light-skinned [[human]] with long black hair. She wore a set of decorated [[chain mail]], and carried a [[buckler]] and [[mace]]-like [[holy symbol]] of Amaunator.
document_data.Description: Karie was a light-skinned [[human]] with long black hair. She wore a set of decorated [[chain mail]], and carried a [[buckler]] and [[mace]]-like [[holy symbol]] of Amaunator.
document_data.Personality: Karie was disgusted by the conditions of the Wheloon Prison, and refused to let the situation go unanswered.
document_data.History:
{{quote
|It's true that the prison was created very quickly. It's possible that some innocent people may be insideâ€¦
|Nearby War Wizard}}
Karie Leddle visited Wheloon alongside other Morninglords like [[Adara Semple]], [[Dai Rolno]], and [[Maribe Banro]]. She could be found at the docks of the Prison, preaching to (or shouting at) the nearby [[Purple Dragons]], [[War Wizards]], magistrates, and dockworkers about the mistreatment and innocence of those held within. She also worked with the [[Wheloon natives]] of [[Harvest Hall]], and knew ways to sneak into the city through the [[Wheloon/Drainage culverts|drainage culverts]] with or without the permission of [[Cormyr]].
